responses: Well, it is not necessary that engineering is the only career option for you. There are many more lines of work to explore. One must not regret of what they choose to build their career upon, after all, it is your future. You must think over again as you still have time.

patterns: I do not know about engineering.
What is engineering?
What does an Engineer do?
responses: It is a branch of science and technology which deals with thinking, designing and building logical solutions. Engineers apply the principles of science and mathematics to develop economical solutions to technical problems.

patterns: Who is a computer engineer?
Who is an IT engineer?
responses: Computer engineers or IT engineers focus on innovationâ€”making computing systems safer, faster and more powerful. They develop, test, install, configure and troubleshoot computer hardware and software.

I want to know more about Electrical engineering
responses: Well it is a wide field to explore. A good thing about it is the freedom, as you can work on both hardware and software. To put it simply, electrical engineers deal with supply and the flow of power and electronics engineer work on making different electrical devices. If you are interested then I will sign you up for our newsletter. Are you interested?

patterns: Who is an electrical engineer?
responses: An electrical engineer is someone who designs and develops new electrical systems, solves problems and tests equipment.

patterns: Who is an EC engineer?
Who is an electronics engineer?
responses: Electronic engineering (also called electronics and communications engineering) is an electrical engineering discipline which utilizes nonlinear and active electrical components such as semiconductor devices, especially transistors, diodes and integrated circuits, to design electronic circuits, devices, VLSI devices and their systems.

patterns: Who is a mechanical engineer?
responses: Mechanical engineers design power-producing machines, such as electric generators, internal combustion engines, and steam and gas turbines, as well as power-using machines, such as refrigeration and air-conditioning systems.

patterns: What is mechanical engineering?
I want to know more about mechanical engineering
responses: A career in Mechanical Engineering allows you to build a bright future for you and for the world. It is a creative profession, with an emphasis on designing, simulating and improving the world we live in. There are many more things we can talk about Mechanical Engineering, if you are interested then I will sign you up for our newsletter. Are you interested?

patterns: Who is a civil engineer?
responses: Civil engineers conceive, design, build, supervise, operate, construct and maintain infrastructure projects and systems in the public and private sector, including roads, buildings, airports, tunnels, dams, bridges, and systems for water supply and sewage treatment.

patterns: What is civil engineering?
I want to know more about Civil engineering
responses: Civil Engineers deal with all the infrasctuctures that we live in. Their line of work require the knowledge of construction industries. If you are interested then I will sign you up for our newsletter. Are you interested?
